amendment.description: Amendment sought to make an across-the-board cut of 5 percent to all discretionary funding accounts in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in part B of House Report 111-191 to make an across-the-board cut of 5 percent to all discretionary funding accounts in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 248 (Roll no. 502).
